3 Affordable

Simple, transparent, and inclusive pricing. Companies pay $125 per month and employees pay 0.5% of their account balances per year.

How many employees do you have?

$600 Less

Harbor costs $600 less per month for employers than typical SMB 401(k) providers.

Increase

Harbor helps each employee increase account balance by $64,229.93 than typical SMB 401(k) providers.

**This is an all-inclusive fee, covering 5 of the 401(k) parts, based on $10,000 contributions per year and 7% market return. Prices as of 1/20/17. Collected directly from several 403(b)(2) forms.
